quotes.quote: Curious things, habits. People themselves never knew they had them.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Good habits result from resisting temptation.
quotes.author: Ancient Proverb

quotes.quote: My problem lies in reconciling my gross habits with my net income.
quotes.author: Errol Flynn

quotes.quote: Habit is habit and not to be flung out of the window by any man, but coaxed downstairs a step at a time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: How use doth breed a habit in a man!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
